<title level="1" pfs="">[Tristian (Level 1)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2399)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Tristian (Level 1)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2399)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 69</row>

**Perception** +7; (trained) [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +5, [Forest Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +4, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +4, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +4, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +4, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +4, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +1

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts), [Explorer's Clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2), [minor healing potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186), [Healer's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=25), [Rations](/Equipment.aspx?ID=40) (1 week), [religious text of Sarenrae](/Equipment.aspx?ID=42), [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), [silver religious symbol of Sarenrae](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41), [Waterskin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=62)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 18

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
scimitar +3 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +4 ([range 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 17, attack +7
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Disrupt Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=79), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×3), [Protection](/Spells.aspx?ID=238), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266)

**Cleric Domain Spells 1 Focus Point,** DC 17
- **1st**
[Healer's Blessing](/Spells.aspx?ID=426)

**Ancestry Feats**   [Angelkin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1348)

**Class Feats**   [Domain Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=265) ([Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15))

**Skill Feats**   [Assurance](/Feats.aspx?ID=756) (Survival), [Multilingual](/Feats.aspx?ID=814)

**Class Abilities**   Deity ([Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16)), Divine Spellcasting,

**Divine Font**   (heal), Doctrine ( <%CLASS.DOCTRINES%1%%> cloistered cleric <%END>)

</column>
name: Tristian (Level 1)
